name: NOKIABALL Tech Demo
description:
A very unfinished 3D physics-based platformer for the Nokia 3310. Recommend playing in fullscreen mode, as the web player crops the game weirdly. Had to leave it in this state as I didn't get much time to work on it.

Use WASD or arrow keys to roll around.

Alt-F4 to quit the desktop build ;)

Made for NOKIA 3310 JAM 3
